content: My son sent me this photo this morning and said the snow caused a 2 hr delay at Camp Lejeune. I don't know if he was serious or joking since it looks like all of 1-2". Meanwhile, I was driving my younger son to school...on time... after we got a foot of snow yesterday here in NH. Don
reply: My son sent me this photo this morning and said the snow caused a 2 hr delay at Camp Lejeune. I don't know if he was serious or joking since it looks like all of 1-2". Meanwhile, I was driving my younger son to school...on time... after we got a foot of snow yesterday here in NH. Don
title: Snow at Camp Lejeune

content: I remember once in 1978 while stationed at Fort Devens, MA. we had about 37" of snow on the ground and I called in to the company that I couldn't make it in and my company SGM told me to put on my mountain ski's and be in the Team Room in one hour. I was there in 45min.!
reply: I remember once in 1978 while stationed at Fort Devens, MA. we had about 37" of snow on the ground and I called in to the company that I couldn't make it in and my company SGM told me to put on my mountain ski's and be in the Team Room in one hour. I was there in 45min.!

content: This is a picture of a very rare occurrence. What you see is Niagara Falls frozen solid. The picture was taken in 1912. How come I pressed "One for English" and still can't understand a word the dude is saying?
